S.FORM: == badas == 翼豆 tingalaw ku kabi nu badas. siwkay nu babaungen badas sa, u nipaluma, taneng mukan, asu'. sabelen ku badas camelen ku titi', asu'. u heci ku kakaenen nu mita. u sulit nu Hulam atu Amilika 四棱豆,(學名:Psophocarpus tetragonolobus), . The winged bean (Psophocarpus tetragonolobus), also known as the Goa bean, four-angled bean, four-cornered bean, Manila bean, Dragon bean, is a tropical legume plant native to New Guinea.

== badas == 翼豆 tingalaw ko kabi no badas. siwkay no babaongen badas sa, o nipaloma, taneng mokan, aso'. sabelen ko badas camelen ko titi', aso'. o heci ko kakaenen no mita. o solit no Holam ato Amilika 四棱豆,(學名:Psophocarpos tetragonolobos), . The winged bean (Psophocarpos tetragonolobos), also known as the Goa bean, foor-angled bean, foor-cornered bean, Manila bean, Dragon bean, is a tropical legome plant native to New Goinea.
